A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
If I had to summarize to one word\, "incoherent" would probably be it.

This movie takes any interesting plot threads from the previous movie and tosses them out the window in a nonsensical way.  There are so many instances of characters inexplicably teleporting wherever the script needed them to be.  There are countless instances of "wait...why don't they just..." or "wait...how did they...?".

And to top it all off\, there is an entire side plot that serves no purpose other than to let Rose soap box to the audience...multiple times.  This should have been omitted entirely.

All that said\, there is one "light speed" seen that is utterly breathtaking.  Other than that\, this movie is a
